title: Saar Biotech- Cefixime and Ofloxacin|Third party Medicine Contract Manufacturing
meta: Saar biotech Third party Medicine Mnufacturing which is situated in baddi is got the permission to manufacture a combination of cefixime trihydrate 100mg/200mg and ofloxacin100mg/200mg tablet.Cefixime Trihydrate is an oral third generation cephalosporin antibiotic. Chemically, it is (6R,7R)-7-{[2-(2-amino-1,3- thiazol-4-yl)-2-(carboxymethoxyimino) acetyl]amino}-3- ethenyl-8-oxo-5-thia-1-azabicyclo-[4.2.0]oct-2-ene-2- carboxylic acid, clinically used in the treatment of susceptible infections including gonorrhoea, otitis media, pharyngitis, lower respiratory-tract infections such as bronchitis, and urinary-tract infections.

Cefixime Ofloxacin, Cefixime Ofloxacin combination, Cefixime Ofloxacin composition, Cefixime Ofloxacin side effects, Cefixime Ofloxacin uses, Cefixime Ofloxacin brands, Cefixime Ofloxacin brands india, Cefixime Ofloxacin dry syrup, Cefixime Ofloxacin suspension, Cefixime Ofloxacin dosage, Typhoid fever , Urinary tract infection, Respiratory tract infection.
name: Cefixime & Ofloxacin
indications:
Indications:- Typhoid fever
, Urinary tract infection and Respiratory tract infection.
